Class SoundEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.BombingGames.WurfelEngine.Core.SoundEngine.SoundEngine

  • public class SoundEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the sounds in the game world.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.String identifier,
                     java.lang.String path)
        Registers a soundIterator. The soundIterator must be loaded via asset manager. You can not register a soundIterator twice.
        Parameters:
        identifier - name of soundIterator
        path - path of the soundIterator

      • play

        public void play(java.lang.String identifier)
        Parameters:
        identifier - name of soundIterator

      • play

        public void play(java.lang.String identifier,
                 AbstractPosition pos)
        Plays soundIterator with decreasing volume depending on distance.
        Parameters:
        identifier - name of soundIterator
        pos - the position of the soundIterator in the world

        Parameters:

        volume -
        pitch -
        Returns:

      • play

        public long play(java.lang.String identifier,
                 float volume,
                 float pitch,
                 float pan)
        Parameters:
        identifier - name of soundIterator
        volume - the volume in the range [0,1]
        pitch - the pitch multiplier, 1 == default, >1 == faster, <1 == slower, the value has to be between 0.5 and 2.0
        pan - panning in the range -1 (full left) to 1 (full right). 0 is center position.
        Returns:

      • loop

        public long loop(java.lang.String identifier)
        playingLoops a soundIterator.
        Parameters:
        identifier - name of soundIterator
        Returns:
        the instance id
        See Also:
        com.​badlogic.​gdx.​audio.​Sound#loop

      • loop

        public long loop(java.lang.String identifier,
                 AbstractPosition pos)
        playingLoops a soundIterator. Sound decay not working.
        Parameters:
        identifier - name of soundIterator
        pos - the position of the soundIterator in the game world. Should be a reference to the position of the object and no copy so that it updates itself.
        Returns:
        the instance id
        See Also:
        com.badlogic.​gdx.​audio.​Sound#loop()

      • stop

        public void stop(java.lang.String identifier)
        Stops all instances of this soundIterator.
        Parameters:
        identifier - name of soundIterator

      • stop

        public void stop(java.lang.String identifier,
                 long instance)
        Stops a specifiy instance of the soundIterator.
        Parameters:
        identifier - name of soundIterator
        instance - the instance returned by play(String) or loop(String).
        See Also:
        Sound.stop()

        Parameters:
